targets.expr: sum(sum_over_time({job="claude-code"} |= "api_request" | json | unwrap attributes_cache_read_tokens [$__range])) / (sum(sum_over_time({job="claude-code"} |= "api_request" | json | unwrap attributes_input_tokens [$__range])) + sum(sum_over_time({job="claude-code"} |= "api_request" | json | unwrap attributes_cache_read_tokens [$__range])))

sum by (attributes_session_id) (sum_over_time({job="claude-code"} |= "api_request" | json | unwrap attributes_input_tokens [$__interval])) + sum by (attributes_session_id) (sum_over_time({job="claude-code"} |= "api_request" | json | unwrap attributes_output_tokens [$__interval]))
